Posts.Content: Jan 29, 2009 06:45PM songmother wrote: Dear DoreenF - thank you for your kind words.  I will post again, but on another thread, this one should just be for AlaskaDeb.  I still can't believe she's gone and everytime I think of her, it's in that crazy indian headdress. love to you all
Posts.Title: Alaska Deb is our newest Angel. Traci-----TripNeg 4753

Posts.Content: Jan 28, 2009 06:58PM songmother wrote: I'm in the UK and I've lurked on this website since my dx in 2004.  I felt AlaskaDeb was a friend and I'm heartbroken and devasted to hear of her passing.  My heart goes out to her husband and family.  She truely was an inspiration, as are the rest of you.  You women on this site have got me through all those lonely, wee small hours when the nightmare comes back.  Thank you AlaskaDeb and all of you. Songmother
Posts.Title: Alaska Deb is our newest Angel. Traci-----TripNeg 4753
